full_threads.body:
Ticket/Issue:
The client reported that the current product image for the Chargriller Grand Champ was incorrect and provided the correct images to be updated.

Action Taken:
  • Replaced the existing product image with the correct one provided by the client.
    Verified that the new image displays correctly on:
    • The Shop page
    • The individual product page

Conclusion:
The product image for the Chargriller Grand Champ has been successfully updated on both the Shop page and the individual product page. The client has been notified of the completion, and further support will be provided as needed.

Hi Bonnie,

Just a quick update on your recent request, I’ve updated the product image for the Chargriller Grand Champ.

The new image is now live and should display correctly on both the Shop page as well as the individual product page.

If there’s anything else you’d like us to check or adjust, just let us know – we’re always happy to help.

Hi Marcelo,

It has been brought to my attention that the below product image is incorrect. I have attached the right ones. Can you please update this asap?

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager

Char-Griller Website Updates – Summary Note

Website: Char-Griller

Request Overview:
The client requested updates to the Char-Griller website to make it clearer for customers where they can purchase products directly and to highlight which models are available. Specific requests included:
  1. Adding a new “Shop” tab to the main navigation menu.
  2. Updating the menu text from “GRILLS & SMOKERS” to “View Our Range.”
  3. Changing the ‘SHOP ALL GRILLS’ button link to point to the new Shop page.
  4. Updating the Shop page content to display 4 models available for direct purchase, including prices and ‘Add to Cart’ buttons.

Action Taken:
  • New Navigation Tab: Added “Shop” to the main menu.
  • Menu Text Change: Updated “GRILLS & SMOKERS” to “View Our Range.”
  • ‘SHOP ALL GRILLS’ Button Link: Updated the link to point to the new Shop page.
  • Shop Page Content: Added the four models with their prices and ‘Add to Cart’ functionality.

Status:
All requested changes have been implemented and are live.

Notes:
  • The Shop page now clearly displays all four models for direct purchase.
  • Navigation and links updated for better clarity and user experience.
  • Client has been notified of completion with an offer for further assistance.

Models Added:
Item Code
Description
CG1733
CHARGRILLER SMOKIN CHAMP
CG8250
CHARGRILLER GRAND CHAMP
CG9800
GRAVITY FED CHARGRILLER BBQ
CG3070
CHARGRILLER TEXAS TRIO
Next Steps / Recommendations:
  • Monitor the Shop page for customer feedback and any further adjustments.
  • Ensure prices and inventory remain up-to-date on the website.
  • Be ready to implement any additional client requests promptly.

Conclusion:
All requested updates have been successfully completed, and the Char-Griller website is now optimized to clearly display available products and facilitate direct purchases. The client has been informed, and further support will be provided as needed.

Hi Bonnie,

Just wanted to give you a quick update, we’ve completed all the changes you requested and everything is now live:

View the link here: https://chargrilleraustralia.com.au/

  • New Navigation Tab: Added a “Shop” tab to the main menu & updated “GRILLS & SMOKERS” to “View Our Range.”

  • ‘SHOP ALL GRILLS’ Button Link: Updated to point to the new Shop page.

  • Shop Page Content: Four models are now displayed with prices and ‘Add to Cart’ buttons.


If there’s anything else you’d like us to tweak, add, or refine, just let us know – we’re always happy to help.

Hi Bonnie,

Happy Monday! Thanks for sending through the details.

Our team is on it and will make sure the new ‘Shop’ landing page clearly features the four models, along with their prices and “Add to Cart” buttons.

If there’s anything else you’d like us to adjust or add while we’re working on this, please don’t hesitate to let us know – we’re always happy to help.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Marcelo Meneses

full_threads.body:
Hi team,

Hope you had a great weekend.

I'd like to make some adjustments to the Char-Griller website so it is clearer where customers can purchase directly, and which models are available.



We have 4 models available to purchase directly off our website:

Item Code
 Description
CG1733
 CHARGRILLER SMOKIN CHAMP
CG8250
 CHARGRILLER GRAND CHAMP
CG9800
 GRAVITY FED CHARGRILLER BBQ
CG3070
 CHARGRILLER TEXAS TRIO

Can you please add the above models to the new 'Shop' landing page? Please include the price below each one on this landing page, with an 'Add to Cart' button.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan
